title: URF thread (yes, another one)
body:
Last year Riot released URF as a joke.
URF quickly became the most loved game mode.
When it got removed people hated Riot, and a lot of them still do.
People spammed for URF to come back.
Riot's response: Riot's response: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/unveiling-future-league-legends
tldr "F\*ck you, f*ck the lot of you"

I really hope this isn't a joke, serves those people right for spamming it.

replies.body:
How is "spamming" a bad thing with this?
They're petition to Riot for something they want, and there were obviously a lot of people who wanted it. 
Riot is a company, and this is customers asking for a product.

> How is "spamming" a bad thing with this?

When is spamming ever a good thing? People made the point clear the first million times they said it, the following several million times were completely unnecessary. Riot did say it would return after all.

So a bunch of scrubs spamming bring back urf means that anyone who is waiting patiently should be punished. You know the only thing that is going to happen is urf doesn't come back is a bunch more kids spamming WTF rito where is urf you trolls screw you. I agree some of the community were completely immature about urf being removed but by going back on the promise of it's return to 'teach' people a lesson is just as immature

> but by going back on the promise of it's return to 'teach' people a lesson is just as immature

They're not going back on the promise of it's return, after all it's still returning just having been changed (as all featured game modes that return are).
I agree, they did say they're going to bring it back in one form or another.

I personally think that Nurf mode is a joke, because why have the abbreviation of New Ultra Rapid Fire when there is no Ultra Rapid Fire in it. Saying that though, if it isn't a joke then this game mode looks interesting anyway, I can't wait to play either tomorrow.
Yeah, people abuse riot for removing gamemode, you f*king deserve this NURF mode, teach you not to spam riot and be rude to them for it

People couldn't grasp the fact the mode was a temporary thing, a vast majority of us had a few games of it and were done as the novelty wore off when people tryharded to win instead of having fun, they should be thankful Riot has decided to bring it back, even if it is a little different.
